nodes.text: The Executive Droid EX-7 was a model of supervisor droid produced by the Okara Droid Company. A number of EX-7 droids worked in one section of the Okara Droid Factory on the planet Balmorra.
The Executive Droid EX-7 appears a type of enemy in the Bounty Hunter class mission "Chaos at the Droid Factory" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
